Description.Text:
Innovation, convenience and comfort are just few of the several characteristics of our rooms. Each of them is featured with colors which remind the beauty of Mediterranean plants and trees. A chest where the deep meaning of your break will be stored. The natural shade of ecru and brown, the solar and warm energy of red, the fresh spirit of green, light blue and turquoise, the spirituality of violet. These colors are the right set for peace and knowledge represented by Olive tree, for auspicious and fertility symbolized by Almond, fecundity by Pomegranate and Myrtle, knowledge and strength by Fico, passion Prickly Pear, continuity by Carob and richness by Hibiscus.
All rooms are equipped with private bathroom, Air Conditioning, Room Service, Mini Bar, Built-in Safe, Free Internet Wi-Fi, TV (45 Channels).
The B&B is 30 meters from the sea and few miles from the main tourist attractions of the area (Valley of the Temples, Birthplace of Luigi Pirandello, Scala dei Turchi) and a few meters from the bus stop.
